Package view

Class TextView

java.lang.Object
view.TextView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class TextView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
A text implementation of the GUI. To run the game using the TextView, run the main method in this file

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.EventObject eventObject)
      Description copied from interface: Observer
      Update method is called to notify the observer instance that the Board Model has been changed. This method is responsible for updating the observer according to the new Board Model.
